device.label: Transform device
device.description:
Provides a means to transform the content of channels. Given a list of channels, a new channel is created that is the result of a simple expression on the input channels.
There are many possible uses for this type of functionality unit conversion, input validation, creating terms that drive further logic, filtering and more.

setting.label: Transform Channels
setting.tooltip: Specify the new transform channels to be generated.

setting.label: Name
setting.tooltip: Specify the name of the channel that will be generated.

setting.label: Unit
setting.tooltip: Specify the unit for the new channel.

setting.label: Channels
setting.tooltip: List of channels involved in the value expression of the new channel.

template.label: Channel
template.tooltip: Channel involved in the mathematical expression for the new channel.

setting.label: Expression
setting.tooltip: Mathematical expression for the channel. i.e. 2*c[0]
